name: contextual-url-shortener
description: A production-ready contextual URL shortener with safety measures and analytics

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:shared"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/web && npm install && cd ../api && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../../packages/shared && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:api
